Name: Appointment Nomination
Description: An appointment nomination is where a person has been nominated for the filling a role or position. Â A nominee might not necessarily have been successfully appointed, only that they were officialy considered for the role.

Properties.Name: From
Properties.Description: The date on which the were nominated

Properties.Name: Nominee
Properties.Description: The person nominated for the role

Properties.Name: Position
Properties.Description: The role or position which this nominations is for

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: The date on which the nominee was removed from the running
